game.name: Reveal Strike
game.categories: Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Co-op, Online Co-op, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Reveal Strike is a third-person team-based shooter. Here, visibility is fleeting, and danger is ever-shifting. The core zones of the map are shrouded in the "Hidden Realm" by default. You face not only the barrels of enemy guns but the sheer terror of the unknown.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Reveal Strike is a third-person team-based shooter. Here, visibility is fleeting, and danger is ever-shifting. The core zones of the map are shrouded in the "Hidden Realm" by default. You face not only the barrels of enemy guns but the sheer terror of the unknown.
